features: 【WB03X24818 RANGE CONTROL KNOB】:WB03X24818 knob burner control knob with mounting hole diameter (D axis size) of 0.25 inch/6.35 mm in length and 0.22 inch/5.52 mm in width,(Please refer to the size picture and measure your burner liner size before purchasing to ensure this knob fits.) AMI PARTS has a professional production workshop and a high-quality quality inspection department to strictly control quality problems before product sales.

【ELECTROPLATING PROCESS】：Package includes 1*WB03X24818 Gas stove knobs. This gas stove knob looks like stainless steel, but it's not, it's made of Premium ABS plastic, and electroplated nickel.Electroplated metal process is more suitable General Electric Gas Range knob, makes the knobs more classic and textured. To prevent oxidation(No rust) anti-rot turbidity, improve wear resistance, heat resistance.And have a super longe service life. It's better than the metal one.

【REPLACE PART NUMBER】：WB03X24818 range stove knobs, only replace part numbers: PS11729081 AP5989029 4363588 ,WB03X24818 control knobs compatible with brand GE. ※※MODELS: JGB645EEK2ES,JGB660EEJ2ES,JGB660SEJ3SS,JGB660SEJ4SS,JGB720EEJ5ES,JGB720SEJ5SS,JGB720EEJ5ES,JGB720SEJ2SS,JGB700SEJ3SS,JGB700EEJ2ES,JGB720EEJ2ES,JGB700SEJ1SS,JGB720SEJ1SS,JGB720SEJ3SS,JGB735SP1SS,JGB860SEJ2SS,JGB860SEJ4SS,JGB860SEJ6SS,JGB860EEJ4ES etc.

【EASY TO SET】: The part can fix the following symptoms:①Will not start②Will not select setting③Will not turn. 🛠 To replace knobs, do not bend the knob up or down, slide the knob directly out of the stem, and slide the replacement knob back to the stem. After using the range, stove or cooktop every time, it is better to clean the front panel.

【BUY WITH CONFIDENCE】： We support return and exchange within 365 days, we have a professional after-sales service team, if you have any questions about this WB03X24818 Stove Knob, ✉please don't give us a bad review first, please contact us via Amazon email or Q&A, we will solve your problem within 24 hours, please give us a chance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are strong and heavy like it was described, but be aware that one or more can be a little bit fade. I don't have any problem but if you are a perfectionist like me, probably would make you a little bit upset.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I soaked the knobs that originally came on our stove not knowing the finished was a wrap. Most of the wrap peeled off leaving white colored knobs with blotches of silver finish. Replacement knobs from the manufacturer are $25/each.. $125 plus tax and shipping for 5. I thought I’d try these and they fit perfectly and our stove looks new again for a fraction of the price! Very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made of metal
reviews.reviewText: These are great, fit as they are supposed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these less than a year ago. They have melted, chipped and one of them makes the knob go on completely crooked. They have been a horrible purchase from the start and I would have returned them had my original GE knobs not been peeling as well. I should note that I cook and bake often but this is ultimately a horrible product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great looking but…
reviews.reviewText: They get piping hot while using my gas stove. So much so I had to use mittens to handle them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are great!!
reviews.reviewText: The original knobs on my stove were plastic. When I tried to clean them them outside surface peeled off. These knobs are what should have been on the stove from day one. Great product and glad I ordered them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to find the replacement knobs and they were received in a very timely manner.
reviews.reviewText: The stove replacement knobs were actually of much better quality than the original ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The knobs are light, plastic with a metal color finish.
reviews.reviewText: Light plastic with metal color coating. Compared to my original GE knobs, they are really cheap feeling. Also, the arch over the **OFF** setting faces the wrong way, even though the are listed as compatible with my stove. I could use them, but they would be upside down with setting **8** where **OFF** belongs. Check which way the D shape on your knob posts faces before ordering and then look at the pics of the knob carefully to make sure they will work for you. The only metal part on what recieved is a small ring inside the artificial metal finish plastic knob, that firs it onto the post. I bought them used, Like new condition. The knobs do look brand newl, but are not metal, don't fit and will be returned. It is notable that there are two (very cheap) metal screws in back, and you might be able to reverse the knob on the back, to make the **D** shaped (that sounds bad but you know what I mean) hole face the correct way, bit the screws look so cheap I think I'd strip them just trying to take the out. They look like aluminum screws. For 30 bucks (used, like new price) It's not worth the effort. I found some on Amazon with a universal D fitting kit, in an 8 pack so I will have spares. Overall. These are NOT better or equal to the heavy knobs that came with my stove. I put those ons in the dishwasher (never do that, oops) and messed up the finish, the plastic clear coat is flaking off. I think these are even lower quality than those. I see many reviews saying numbers and silver color flakes off, I ordered uncoated solid black this time...to avoid that. These did fit on the power burner, thas one plus (some knobs do not, there are 2 posts for that type of burner).
